description:
This table, `GeranFreqGroupRelation`, stores parameters defining the relationship between GERAN (GSM/EDGE/UMTS Radio Access Network) frequency groups and other network elements, including cell selection priorities and mobility actions.

- `dateTime`: Timestamp indicating when the record was generated.
- `Area_Name`: Name of the geographic area.
- `CellId`: Unique identifier of the cell site.
- `Id2`: Redundant Cell ID.
- `Id3`:  Another unique identifier potentially related to a specific radio unit.
- `Id4`:  Another unique identifier, likely an internal index.
- `vsDataType`: Data type identifier.
- `vsDataFormatVersion`: Version of the data format.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.nccPermitted`: Allowed Network Colour Codes (NCCs).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.userLabel`: User-defined label (potentially empty).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.b2Thr1RsrqGeranFreqOffset`: Frequency offset for B2 threshold 1 RSRQ.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.b2GeranOffsetPerPC`: GERAN offset per priority class (potentially empty).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.altCsfbTargetPrioEc`: Priority for alternative CSFB target (Emergency Call).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.mobilityAction`: Action taken during mobility (e.g., handover).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.pMaxGeran`: Maximum power for GERAN.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.altCsfbTargetPrio`: Priority for alternative CSFB target.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.b2Thr1RsrpGeranFreqOffset`: Frequency offset for B2 threshold 1 RSRP.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.allowedPlmnList`: List of allowed PLMNs (empty string indicates all PLMNs).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.threshXLow`: Lower threshold X.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.anrMeasOn`: Flag indicating whether ANR measurement is enabled.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.qRxLevMin`: Minimum required Rx level.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.cellReselectionPriority`: Cell reselection priority.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.csFallbackPrioEC`: Priority for CS fallback (Emergency Call).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.geranFreqGroupRef`: Reference to the GERAN frequency group.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.qOffsetFreq`: Frequency offset Q.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.csFallbackPrio`: Priority for CS fallback.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.connectedModeMobilityPrio`: Priority for connected mode mobility.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.mobilityActionCsfb`: Action for CSFB mobility.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.qciB2ThrOffsets`: QCI specific B2 threshold offsets (potentially empty).
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.b2Thr2GeranFreqOffset`: Frequency offset for B2 threshold 2.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.geranFreqGroupRelationId`: Unique identifier for the relation.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.threshXHigh`: Higher threshold X.
- `GeranFreqGroupRelation.voicePrio`: Voice priority.
